00020 void jamoma_object_initclass(void)
00021 {
00022         t_class *c;
00023         
00024         // Define our class
00025         c = class_new(  "jamoma", 
00026                                         (method)jamoma_object_new, 
00027                                         (method)jamoma_object_free, 
00028                                         sizeof(t_jamoma_object), 
00029                                         (method)NULL, 
00030                                         0L, 0);
00031 
00032         // Make methods accessible for our class: 
00033         //class_addmethod(c, (method)jamoma_object_snapshot_capture,            "snapshot/capture",             A_GIMME, 0L);
00034         //class_addmethod(c, (method)jamoma_object_snapshot_recall,                     "snapshot/recall",              A_GIMME, 0L);
00035         //class_addmethod(c, (method)jamoma_object_snapshot_interpolate,        "snapshot/interpolate", A_GIMME, 0L);
00036 
00037         // Finalize our class
00038         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00039         s_jamoma_class = c;
00040 }
00041

00043 t_object* jamoma_object_new()
00044 {
00045         t_jamoma_object         *obj = (t_jamoma_object *)object_alloc(s_jamoma_class);
00046         if(obj){
00047                 ;
00048         }
00049         return (t_object*)obj;
00050 }
